numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a difference in major sports.
2. In these major sports, there are more players of color than coaches of color.
3. In baseball, most players do not identify as colored.
4. I wonder why there are not many people of color in higher levels of the sports industry.
5. It is possible that non-colored coaches are more qualified than coaches of color.
6. It is also possible that some organizations do not hire people of color for high positions.
7. This graph shows our generation something.
8. This graph shows that people of color can play sports with other people that look like them.
9. This graph shows that people of color can play sports without being uncomfortable.
10. However, we do not see many coaches of color.
12. This situation sends the message that people of color are not fit for higher positions.
13. The headline is: Is it truly diverse?
14. The headline is: Analyzing sports norms in teams and coaches.
